TopicTitle: [Long live the USSR :) ] 9K35 Strela-10 [With Bearing and four small missiles]

Articles.Content:
They're dead. But that doesn't stop the Russian Federation from selling their equipment. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) :)

![nON3RVo.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/nON3RVo.jpg)

![H1No2CP.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/H1No2CP.jpg)

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/n8TCyszwyWE?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="459" height="344" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/03ehUnqn7WM?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

You have to stage the bearing the instant physics loads, or else you'll get some weird glitching if you're just unlucky.

The Download: [https://www.dropbox.com/s/6zx19llkz0so8j1/A%20K%201_3.craft?dl=0](https://www.dropbox.com/s/6zx19llkz0so8j1/A%20K%201_3.craft?dl=0)
